Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: mbaTrackingName
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Name that will be sent to MBurger automation instead of the class name

Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.name: mbaTrackingMetadata
Extensions/UIViewController.html#/s:So16.abstract: Metdata that will be sent to MBurger automation for this viewController, you need to set this before viewDidAppear is called

Enums/MBTriggerType.html#/s:17MBAutomati.name: unknown
Enums/MBTriggerType.html#/s:17MBAutomati.abstract: An unknown trigger, used when the type is not recognized

Enums/MBTagChangeOperator.html#/s:17MBAu.name: equal
Enums/MBTagChangeOperator.html#/s:17MBAu.abstract: The tag needs to be equal to the value of the trigger

Enums/MBTagChangeOperator.html#/s:17MBAu.name: notEqual
Enums/MBTagChangeOperator.html#/s:17MBAu.abstract: The tag needs to be different to the value of the trigger

Enums/LocationTriggerAction.html.name: LocationTriggerAction
Enums/LocationTriggerAction.html.abstract: The trigger action that needs to happen

Classes/MBViewTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutoma.name: view
Classes/MBViewTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutoma.abstract: The view that needs to be opened

Classes/MBViewTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutoma.name: times
Classes/MBViewTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutoma.abstract: The times the user needs to open the view

Classes/MBViewTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutoma.name: secondsOnView
Classes/MBViewTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutoma.abstract: Sections the user needs to stay in the view

Classes/MBViewTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutoma.name: numberOfTimes
Classes/MBViewTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutoma.abstract: The number of times this event has happened

Classes/MBTagChangeTrigger.html#/s:17MBA.name: tagChangeOperator
Classes/MBTagChangeTrigger.html#/s:17MBA.abstract: If the tag needs to be equal/different for this trigger to be activated

Classes/MBLocationTrigger.html#/s:17MBAu.name: radius
Classes/MBLocationTrigger.html#/s:17MBAu.abstract: The radius of the region in meters

Classes/MBLocationTrigger.html#/s:17MBAu.name: action
Classes/MBLocationTrigger.html#/s:17MBAu.abstract: If the user needs to enter/exit the region in order for this trigger to become valid

Classes/MBInactiveUserTrigger.html#/s:17.name: days
Classes/MBInactiveUserTrigger.html#/s:17.abstract: The days that needs to pass to make this trigger valid

Classes/MBEventTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutom.name: times
Classes/MBEventTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutom.abstract: The times the event needs to happen

Classes/MBEventTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutom.name: numberOfTimes
Classes/MBEventTrigger.html#/s:17MBAutom.abstract: The number of times this event has happened

Classes/MBAppOpeningTrigger.html#/s:17MB.name: times
Classes/MBAppOpeningTrigger.html#/s:17MB.abstract: The times that needs to be opened in order for this trigger to become valid

Classes/MBAutomation.html#/s:17MBAutomat.name: init(trackingEnabled:trackViewsAutomatically:eventsTimerTime:)
Classes/MBAutomation.html#/s:17MBAutomat.abstract: Initializes the plugin, if trackViewsAutomatically if yes the views are tracked automatically. It uses method swizzling to track automatically screen view once view did appear happens.

Classes/MBAutomation.html#/s:17MBAutomat.name: trackScreenView(_:)
Classes/MBAutomation.html#/s:17MBAutomat.abstract: Sets the current view controller, this can be used if automatic view tracking is disabled or to force a particular screen

Classes/MBAutomation.html#/s:17MBAutomat.name: messagesReceived(messages:fromStartup:)
Classes/MBAutomation.html#/s:17MBAutomat.abstract: Invoked by the MBurger plugins manager when a new message is received by the MBMessages plugin

Classes/MBAutomation.html#/s:17MBAutomat.name: tagChanged(tag:value:)
Classes/MBAutomation.html#/s:17MBAutomat.abstract: Invoked by the MBurger plugins manager when a tag changes in the MBAudience plugin

Classes/MBAutomation.html#/s:17MBAutomat.name: locationDataUpdated(latitude:longitude:)
Classes/MBAutomation.html#/s:17MBAutomat.abstract: Invoked by the MBurger plugins manager when new location data is available in the MBAudience plugin

Classes/MBAppOpeningTrigger.html.name: MBAppOpeningTrigger
Classes/MBAppOpeningTrigger.html.abstract: A trigger that becomes true if the app is opened n times

Classes/MBEventTrigger.html.name: MBEventTrigger
Classes/MBEventTrigger.html.abstract: An event trigger, this trigger becomes valid when an event happens n times

Classes/MBInactiveUserTrigger.html.name: MBInactiveUserTrigger
Classes/MBInactiveUserTrigger.html.abstract: An inactive user trigger, this trigger becomes valid when the user has not openend the app for n days

Classes/MBLocationTrigger.html.name: MBLocationTrigger
Classes/MBLocationTrigger.html.abstract: A location trigger, fires if the user enters/exits a region

Classes/MBTagChangeTrigger.html.name: MBTagChangeTrigger
Classes/MBTagChangeTrigger.html.abstract: A tag change trigger, fires when the specified tag changes and become equal/different from the value, based on tagChangeOperator

Classes.html#/c:@M@MBAutomationSwift@obj.name: MBTrigger
Classes.html#/c:@M@MBAutomationSwift@obj.abstract: A trigger associated with a message, if the message has triggers, the display of messages and push notification will be managed with the MBAutomation plugin

Classes/MBViewTrigger.html.name: MBViewTrigger
Classes/MBViewTrigger.html.abstract: A view trigger, becomes true when the user opens a view n times
